text: Plínio Osvaldo Fonseca Brito, known as Pinha (born 5 August 1972) is a former Cape Verdean football player. He also holds Portuguese citizenship. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Académico de Viseu on 12 January 1992 in a game against Portimonense. He made his Primeira Liga debut for União de Leiria on 1 September 1996, when he played the whole game in a 0–3 loss to Leça. ==References== ==External links== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Cape Verdean footballers Category:Académico de Viseu F.C. players Category:LigaPro players Category:C.D.
